Unnamed: 1: Amount of electronic waste collected; percentage recovered through recycling
Unnamed: 5: Our electronic waste business was discontinued in FY20. \nElectronic waste is still collected through our solids business, curb side collections and transfer stations. This volume cannot be accurately reported due to data limitations. \nElectronic waste collected is recycled as per requirements of the National Television and Computer Recycling Scheme, established in 2011 by the Australian government.
